title: 3. Lalpa chu chawimawi ru Pathian chaka chu
lyrics:
Doh is Bâ™­
Lalpa chu chawimawi r'u, Pathian chaka chu,
Chhandamna mak tak leh kan pialral kalkawng
Min hrilh tawh avangin amah chu fak r'u,
Meialh leh chhumding zingah min hruai zel a.

Angel-te u, fak r'u, in awm zawng zawngin,
A hmel ropui chuan mi rilru a chhun eng;
A ram ropui tak chu a zau deuh deuh vang,
A hnathawh zawng zawngin, (2)
Lalpa an fak, aw ka thlarau, fak ve rawh.

Thlarau vakvai hnenah tlanna hlu a pe,
Mi sualte tan faina lui a luantir a;
A tlansate min hmangaih em avnagin,
Kan tawngtai a chhang thin, Lalpa chu fak r'u.

Lalpa chu chawimawi r'u, kan mangan laiin,
A khawngaihna thahruiin min rawn vuan ta;
Rinna leh beiseinaa hnehtute nen,
Hmangaina ramah kan intawk khawm leh ang.
